comment.author: 8716770@N08
comment._content: Wife is Charlotte Elizabeth nee Munroe (married 1886), the two daughters are Shirley and Brenda. Source: Genealogical and family history of the state of Maine, Volume 1 By George Thomas Little, Henry Sweetser Burrage, Albert Roscoe Stubbs, 1909, books.google.com/books?id=LDryyTRj8tgC&dq=herbert putnam family&as_brr=4&client=firefox-a&pg=PA60#v=onepage&q=herbert putnam family&f=false
